title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 118.4 - Modification for share of estate or trust in New York fiduciary adjustment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 118.4 - Modification for share of estate or trust in New York fiduciary adjustment

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 618(3)

The share of an estate or trust in the New York fiduciary
adjustment, as determined under Part 119 of this Article, must be added to or
subtracted from, as the case may be, the Federal taxable income of the estate
or trust in determining its New York taxable income. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
118.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
